headline: Deutsche Bank Downgrades Liberty Broadband Amid Charter Communications Merger
summary: Liberty Broadband was downgraded from "buy" to "hold" by Deutsche Bank following its merger announcement

headline: John Malone M&A Cleanup Costs Minority Investors
summary: Charter Communications has reached a deal to acquire Liberty Broadband. Liberty investors are set to receive 0.236 CHTR shares for each of their shares, plus spun-out subsidiary GCI.
